data.title: Pokemon Go Trainers: Get Pokemon Go Bonuses, Skins & More at Verizon
data.meta_description: Looking for Pokemon Go bonuses, bundles, exclusive outfits, and more? Find out where you can score these items today.
data.text:
Get Pokémon GO avatar outfits at no charge on your device to customize your avatar. Your avatar outfits don’t expire and give you access to the first face mask in the game!

This limited-time offer is available until 12/31/21.

To play Pokémon GO, you need a Niantic* account, a smartphone device and network connectivity.

You can visit the Google PlayTM or Apple(R) Store to download the free Pokémon GO app and create an account on your mobile device.

*Niantic is the company behind Pokémon Go. Learn more about Niantic.

The Pokémon GO avatar outfits are time-limited* content you can download in the Pokémon app that let you change your character’s outfits. The content is optional to use and can be changed within the game.

The outfits are available for a limited time* through this offer.

*Offer ends Dec 31, 2021. One offer per Pokémon GO account. Void where prohibited. Redemption and activation must be completed by 11:59 p.m. PDT on Dec 31, 2021 to receive the offer. Data rates apply. Additional terms apply.

See above to copy and paste the code to redeem.*

Note: If you can’t locate the code, contact Verizon customer service.

*Offer ends Dec 31, 2021. One offer per Pokémon GO account. Void where prohibited. Redemption and activation must be completed by 11:59 p.m. PDT on Dec 31, 2021 to receive the offer. Data rates apply. Additional terms apply. During gameplay, please be aware of your surroundings and play safely. Only one code per user can be redeemed. Lost or stolen codes will not be reissued under any circumstances.

©2016 – 2021 Niantic, Inc. ©2016 – 2021 Pokémon. ©1995 – 2021 Nintendo / Creatures Inc. / GAME FREAK Inc. Pokémon and Pokémon character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
